translation.en: Small boat adrift! Starboard bow.
Look, look starboard.
Up into the wind. Get out the small boat.
translation.ko: 바람을 마주하고 항해한다! 작은 보트를 꺼내!

translation.en: Pull away!
Easy.
Get that jimmy.
Is anyone aboard?
-I can't tell. Why don't you get-- -Get that painter.
translation.ko: - 사람이 있나? - 모르겠습니다 밧줄 잡아! 당겨, 키어니!

translation.en: Pull that line, Kearney.
Come on, get that boat in.
Watch the sides.
There's two of them, sir. A man and a woman.
-Dead or alive? -Dead, sir.
-A child, sir. -A what?
Alive.
I'll take him. Thank you, ma'am.
There, now.
"We therefore commit their bodies to the bosom of the waters
to be turned into corruption looking for the resurrection of the body
translation.ko: '육신은 썩어 없어지나' '바다가 이들을 받아들이면 언젠가 환생하여'

translation.en: when the sea shall give up her dead and the life of the world to come...
translation.ko: '바다가 이들을 받아들이면 언젠가 환생하여' '새 삶을 살리라 예수님의 이름으로, 아멘'

translation.en: Through Our Lord, Jesus Christ. Amen."
Captain.
The surgeon would like to have a word with you, sir.
The sickness in the crew, sir.
You've got five more taken down since midwatch.
translation.ko: 하룻밤 새 다섯 명이 더 쓰러졌어요

translation.en: Fever. Canker sores.
Your cabinet is full of bromide. Now, leech it out.
It's beyond bleeding, sir.
Mr. Penfield... I look to your medical knowledge.
translation.ko: 펜필드 씨, 난 당신의 의학적 지식을 믿습니다

translation.en: Three days after we left Moorea, you thought it was scurvy.
translation.ko: 모오레아 섬을 떠날 때는 괴혈병이라고 하지 않았습니까

translation.en: Half the crew took sick. You told me it was breakbone fever.
The symptoms weren't for certain. Now I know.
Fever. Withered skin.
Black bile.
Cholera.
Can't we turn back, Captain? There's no port for a plague ship.
translation.ko: - 돌아갈 수 있을까요? - 아무도 안 받아 줄 거야

translation.en: Drop anchor at the first island. This is all open sea.
translation.ko: - 처음 닿는 섬에 정박해요 - 여기는 망망대해야

translation.en: With due respect, Captain, that small boat put off from somewheres.
translation.ko: 그 작은 배가 출발한 섬이 어딘가에 있을 겁니다

translation.en: This is a French naval chart. There's nothing but warnings.
translation.ko: 이건 프랑스 해도야 온통 경고 표시밖에 없어

translation.en: There's reefs, atolls.
This is a cruel turn for Mrs. Hargrave. Left widowed with an infant.
translation.ko: 하그레이브 부인만 불쌍하지 아기 딸린 과부인데

translation.en: Cast them adrift.
A woman alone with two children? Put a man with them.
translation.ko: - 여자 혼자, 애 둘이랑? - 남자도 보내세요

translation.en: Kearney's strong, and he's still able.
That'll give them a chance. That's more than I can say for us.
Kearney.
Best of a poor lot.
But keep it from the rest of the crew.
-Wait till midwatch. -Aye, sir.
Putting us off into the peril of an open sea because some of the crew are ill?
translation.ko: 선원 몇 명이 아프다고 우리를 망망대해에 내보내요?

translation.en: -This is madness. -I'm thinking of your own good, ma'am.
translation.ko: - 말도 안 돼요! - 부인을 위한 겁니다

translation.en: I may be young, but I have spent the last three years
translation.ko: 제가 어리기는 해도 지난 3년간 폭염도 견뎌 내고

translation.en: In a climate of fearsome heat with insects as big as rats
translation.ko: 제가 어리기는 해도 지난 3년간 폭염도 견뎌 내고 쥐만 한 벌레나 고양이만 한 쥐도 다 견뎠어요

translation.en: and rats as big as cats.
translation.ko: 쥐만 한 벌레나 고양이만 한 쥐도 다 견뎠어요

translation.en: I can certainly deal with some deckhands down with fever.
translation.ko: 열나는 선원들쯤은 거뜬히 견딜 수 있다고요!

translation.en: We're carrying cholera. If you stay aboard, you'll die.
translation.ko: 콜레라가 퍼졌어요 계속 있으면 부인도 죽습니다

translation.en: You can't take your sea chest, missus. Only things you really need.
translation.ko: 가방은 다 못 싣습니다, 부인 꼭 필요한 것만 챙기세요

translation.en: But everything we have in the world would be in this chest.
Mrs. Hargrave will be taking her belongings.
Aye, sir.
Cholera?
Mr. Kearney? Mr. Kearney, a cup of water, please.
translation.ko: 키어니 씨 부탁이니 물 한 잔만 주세요

translation.en: There's only so much, missus. They're in sore need, Mr. Kearney.
Look, the boy ain't yours, so he don't matter too much.
Your infant knows what to do.
I'd say you're fresh. Let her suckle.
I'll tell you right now. I'm sick and tired of them two squalling.
translation.ko: 꼬맹이 둘이 꽥꽥거리는 소리 지겨워 죽겠어요

translation.en: Then, for the love of God, give them water.
translation.ko: 그럼 제발 애들한테 물 좀 줘요

translation.en: I'm a practical man, missus.
If I was alone, by myself, this could last a good while.
translation.ko: 나 혼자 가면 더 오래 버틸 수 있어요

translation.en: Sharing four ways makes no sense.
The best thing for all of us is to put them out of their misery.
translation.ko: 우리 모두를 위해서 애들은 없는 게 나아요

translation.en: You won't touch them.
I'll do what has to be done. Shut them up, or they're both going overboard.
translation.ko: 필요하면 할 겁니다 그러니까 조용히 시켜요

translation.en: Hush, Lilli.
That's it. Look the other way if you don't want to see.
translation.ko: 더는 못 참아 못 보겠으면 고개 돌려요

translation.en: Come on, Richard. Come quickly. Jump up.
You can help Mama.
Yeah, that's my girl.
Yes.
Come on. Come on, Lilli.
Richard, you stay here.
It's fresh.
Look.
Bananas and papaws.
translation.ko: 저것 봐, 바나나야! 폼폰국화랑 뿌리채소도 있네 뿌리채소는 맛도 좋잖아!

translation.en: And roots. Roots are good eating.
translation.ko: 폼폰국화랑 뿌리채소도 있네 뿌리채소는 맛도 좋잖아!

translation.en: This is taro root. We ate it at the mission.
translation.ko: 이건 토란 뿌리다! 선교 가서 먹었던 거야

translation.en: And bananas. Come on, Richard. Here's some bananas.
translation.ko: 바나나가 있다니 리처드, 이리 와, 바나나야!

translation.en: Yes, lots of bananas.
Boat.
Here, do you want some?
The boat is coming.
Boat.
Look. How pretty.
There.
Lilli.
We can't stay here.
We're too exposed on this side.
We've got to find a safe haven out of the weather. Come on.
Come, Richard. Let's go for a little walk.
Here we go.
Look. How beautiful!
House.
Good heavens.
Richard?
Mama.
She's gone.
I know she's gone. Your mama's gone.
It's all right. It's all right. Come here, I've got you.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 이리 와 아줌마가 잡아 줄게

translation.en: Mommy's gone. I know. It's all right.
Your mama's not here, but I am. I'll be your mommy from now on.
translation.ko: 아줌마가 있잖아 이제부터 내가 네 엄마야

translation.en: Any passing ship will be able to see this when it's ablaze.
translation.ko: 이걸 불태우면 지나가는 배가 볼 거야

translation.en: It won't be long before one finds us.
Go to sleep now. Close your eyes.
I'll be right back.
I know this is your favorite dessert, Richard, but eat more slowly.
translation.ko: 리처드, 아무리 맛있어도 천천히 먹어야 해

translation.en: And hold the spoon this way, as I've showed you.
translation.ko: 이렇게 숟가락 잡아 엄마가 보여 준 대로

translation.en: After the ship comes, you'll find yourself seated
at a well-appointed table in San Francisco
translation.ko: 잘 차려진 식탁에서 식사하게 될 거야

translation.en: and be expected to show proper table manners.
translation.ko: 올바른 식사 예절을 보여 줘야 한단다

translation.en: Richard, don't do that.
Richard! Just because we are away from civilization,
does not mean we will behave uncivilized.
Full moon.
They come every three months when the moon is full.
translation.ko: 석 달에 한 번 보름달이 뜰 때 오는구나

translation.en: Off to bed, children. Quickly.
Richard, come.
It'll be all right. Tonight you will get your lullaby in the dark.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 오늘 밤은 불 끄고 자장가 불러 줄게

translation.en: Love Divine, all Loves excelling
Joy of Heaven to Earth come down
Fix in us thy humble Dwelling
All thy faithful Mercies crown
Jesus, thou art all compassion
Pure, unbounded love thou art
The mother.
Put it down!
Mother, why do you wear your clothes when you bathe?
Because it's proper.
Why don't Richard and I wear clothes when we bathe?
translation.ko: 그럼 오빠랑 나는 왜 옷을 안 입는데요?

translation.en: I gave up on you two long ago.
I'd put your clothes on, and you'd just take them off.
translation.ko: 옷을 입히면 너희가 다 벗어 버렸거든

translation.en: -I wish I looked like Richard down there. -Why?
Because he can aim when he goes... I can hit a mango leaf dead center.
translation.ko: - 오줌 쌀 때 조준하잖아요 - 망고 잎을 정확히 맞췄어요

translation.en: Why does he have one he can aim and we don't?
translation.ko: 왜 오빠만 있고 우리는 없어요? 왜냐하면, 하느님이 어떤 이유에서인지...

translation.en: God, in his infinite wisdom, decided...
Well, nature gave us different parts.
-Well, you see, a female has a-- -A cowrie shell.
What? Lilli looks like a cowrie shell down there.
So that's what you call mine, a cowrie shell.
-And we call Richard's a-- -No.
translation.ko: - 그리고 오빠 건... - 아니, 안 알려 줘도 돼

translation.en: Never mind. I think this has gone a little far.
translation.ko: - 그리고 오빠 건... - 아니, 안 알려 줘도 돼 대화가 너무 멀리 갔다

translation.en: I should've explained certain of life's facts to you years ago.
translation.ko: 자연의 이치에 대해 진작 알려 줄 걸 그랬어

translation.en: Explain certain of life's facts now. No, I need to think about it first.
translation.ko: - 지금 알려 주세요 - 엄마가 먼저 생각해 볼게

translation.en: I'll explain it to you after your spelling lesson tonight.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 글자 공부하고 나서 설명해 줄게

translation.en: -Come on. Let's rinse. -Tonight?
Let's rinse off. All right? Everybody?
Why do people get married?
It was God's commandment that when a man and woman love each other...
translation.ko: 남녀가 사랑하면 결혼하라고 하느님이 정해 주셨거든

translation.en: They take vows. Vows are like promises.
translation.ko: 사랑의 서약을 하는 거야 서약은 약속 같은 거란다

translation.en: They make promises to each other
in the eyes of God for the whole world to witness.
translation.ko: 하느님과 온 세상이 보는 앞에서 서로에게 약속하는 거지

translation.en: And that's called the marriage ceremony.
And here is the ceremony your father used to say
when he performed marriages at the mission.
translation.ko: 결혼식 주례를 서면서 하시던 말씀이 적혀 있어

translation.en: What about the life of facts?
When a girl becomes a woman and a boy becomes a man...
translation.ko: 소녀가 여자가 되고 소년이 남자가 될 때...

translation.en: When's that?
Well, it's different for everyone, but you'll know when it happens to you.
translation.ko: - 그게 언제인데요? - 사람마다 달라 - 때가 되면 너도 알 거야 - 어떻게요?

translation.en: How?
translation.ko: - 때가 되면 너도 알 거야 - 어떻게요?

translation.en: Well, Lilli... Your body will become rounder. You'll grow breasts like mine.
translation.ko: 몸이 더 둥글어지고 엄마처럼 가슴이 나오거든

translation.en: And every month you'll bleed from the opening between your legs.
translation.ko: 그리고 한 달에 한 번씩 다리 사이에서 피가 나

translation.en: I don't want to bleed.
It only lasts a few days.
And it's a great blessing, because it means you can have a baby.
translation.ko: 그리고 그건 큰 축복이야 아기를 가질 수 있게 되거든

translation.en: Do I have to bleed? No. But your body will change, too.
translation.ko: - 저도 피가 나요? - 아니, 하지만 너도 달라져

translation.en: Your voice will grow deeper, and you'll grow hair on your face.
translation.ko: 목소리는 더 깊어지고 얼굴에 수염도 나지

translation.en: And I think you'd look very handsome with a beard. Unless, of course, you want to scrape it off.
translation.ko: 넌 수염 나면 참 멋질 거야 깎기 싫으면 그냥 둬도 돼

translation.en: I want the baby now. You can't. You're not ready yet.
translation.ko: - 지금 아기 갖고 싶어요 - 지금은 준비가 안 됐어

translation.en: When you are, you need the man to make the baby that will grow inside you.
translation.ko: 그리고 남자가 있어야 네 안에 아기를 만들 수 있어

translation.en: Inside me?
Yes. There's a special place inside a woman
translation.ko: 응, 여자 몸속에는 특별한 공간이 있거든

translation.en: where the baby stays nice and warm and safe
translation.ko: 아기가 따뜻하고 안전하게 머물 수 있는 곳이야

translation.en: until it's ready to be born into the world.
translation.ko: 그 안에서 준비를 하고 세상으로 나오지

translation.en: How does the baby get in there?
After they're married, the man and woman lie very...
Close together... -And-- -I know. It's like the iguanas, Lilli.
translation.ko: - 아주 가까이 누우면... - 알겠다! 릴리, 기억나?

translation.en: You know when they get so close you can't tell
translation.ko: 이구아나 두 마리가 가까이 붙어 있을 때 어디까지가 한 마리인지 구별 안 되잖아

translation.en: where one begins and the other ends?
translation.ko: 어디까지가 한 마리인지 구별 안 되잖아

translation.en: -That's it. -That's it?
Yes. Because the iguanas always have their babies soon after.
translation.ko: 그래, 그러고 나면 항상 새끼가 태어나잖아

translation.en: That's it, Mother? Well, that's most of it.
That's what I've been waiting to hear all day?
That's not going to help. Look what you did to my spear. Go away.
translation.ko: - 그래 봤자 소용없어 - 네가 작살을 망가트렸잖아!

translation.en: That was my fish. Go back out where you belong.
translation.ko: 내가 잡은 고기란 말이야 너희 집으로 가 버려!

translation.en: Richard, look. Now what are we gonna do?
What are we gonna do now, Richard?
-What are we gonna do? -Will you just be quiet and let me think?
translation.ko: - 어떡해? - 생각 좀 하게 조용히 해

translation.en: Lilli!
Richard!
We're out past sunset. Mother's gonna be so angry.
-What are you doing? -I've got an idea.
He's coming, come on.
Where have you been? Do you realize how late it is?
Yes, Mother, but there was this shark, an old one
translation.ko: 알아요, 근데 상어가 있었어요 늙은 상어가 물길에 들어와서

translation.en: out in the channel. He took half of Richard's spear.
translation.ko: 알아요, 근데 상어가 있었어요 늙은 상어가 물길에 들어와서 오빠 작살을 망가트렸어요

translation.en: I have told you to keep away from sharks.
-The boat drifted loose. -What are the rules, Richard?
-Be home by sunset always. -And?
translation.ko: - 해 지기 전에 집에 오기 - 또?

translation.en: -Never to the north side of the island. -Do you see that? A full moon.
translation.ko: - 섬 북쪽에는 가지 않기 - 저것 봐, 보름달이잖아

translation.en: We are going straight home, and this is never happening again. Do you hear me?
translation.ko: 당장 집에 가자 다시는 이러지 마, 알겠니?

translation.en: Come, O thou Traveler unknown
Whom still I hold, but cannot see!
translation.ko: 아직도 널 붙잡고 있지만 보이지 않는구나

translation.en: My company before is gone
And I am left alone with Thee
Lilli. Richard. Go get some thatch.
Get back inside.
"Our Father who art in heaven, Hallowed be thy name.
translation.ko: 하늘에 계신 우리 아버지 이름을 거룩하게 하시며

translation.en: Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done...
translation.ko: 아버지의 나라가 오게 하시며 뜻이 땅에서도 이뤄지게 하소서

translation.en: On earth as it is in heaven. Give us this day our daily bread.
translation.ko: 아버지의 나라가 오게 하시며 뜻이 땅에서도 이뤄지게 하소서 일용할 양식을 주시고 우리가 죄지은 자를 사했듯이

translation.en: And forgive us our trespasses, As we forgive those who trespass against us.
translation.ko: 일용할 양식을 주시고 우리가 죄지은 자를 사했듯이 우리 죄를 사하여 주옵소서 우리를 시험에 들지 않게 하고

translation.en: And lead us not into temptation, But deliver us from evil.
translation.ko: 우리 죄를 사하여 주옵소서 우리를 시험에 들지 않게 하고 악에서 구하소서 나라와 권세와 영광이...

translation.en: For thine is the kingdom, the power, and the glory, forever and ever. Amen."
I can feel that the sickness has moved into my lungs now.
translation.ko: 엄마 병이 폐까지 퍼진 것 같아

translation.en: And that means I might not get well.
What's going to happen?
You may have to be here without me.
translation.ko: 엄마 없이 너희 둘이 지내야 해

translation.en: If God wants...
I'll be with your father, and we'll be like guardian angels watching over you.
translation.ko: 엄마는 너희 아빠 곁에 가서 너희의 수호천사가 될 거야

translation.en: This is my special place.
It's quiet here, and I can see the house.
Hollow out this ground... About so deep.
And line it with thatch and moss.
Then fill it in...
And smooth it over with earth.
I'll write out a prayer for you to say.
We'll carve a marker, and it will say,
translation.ko: 그리고 나무판에 이렇게 새겨서 세워 놔

translation.en: "Here lies Sarah Hargrave...
Wife of William... Mother of Lillian."
And I know I'm not your real mother, Richard
translation.ko: 리처드, 내가 네 진짜 엄마는 아니지만

translation.en: but I would like to have it say,
"and Mother of Richard."
"We pray to the Lord to grant this last abiding wish.
That Lilli and Richard love one another, and take care of one another
translation.ko: '릴리와 리처드가 서로를 사랑하고 아끼게 해 주시옵고'

translation.en: and keep up with their lessons, and be prepared for the ship when it comes.
translation.ko: '끊임없이 공부하여' '구조선이 오는 날을 기다리게 하소서, 아멘'

translation.en: Amen."
-Breakfast looks extra good today. -Thank you.
Don't forget, it's your turn to cook tomorrow.
translation.ko: 잊지 마 내일은 오빠가 요리할 차례야

translation.en: I won't forget. You're the one who always forgets.
translation.ko: 난 안 잊어버려 네가 항상 잊어버리지

translation.en: What do I forget? You forgot to color your eggs for the hunt.
translation.ko: - 내가 뭘 잊어버려? - 달걀 색칠 안 했잖아

translation.en: I didn't forget. I just don't think we should do it this year.
translation.ko: 잊어버린 거 아니야 그냥 올해는 안 하고 싶어

translation.en: But we do it every Easter.
The marks on the calendar say tomorrow's Easter, so we must have the hunt.
translation.ko: 내일이 부활절이야 그러니까 달걀 찾기도 해야지

translation.en: Why?
How else do we know who finds the most eggs and wins?
translation.ko: 그래야 누가 더 많이 찾아서 이기는지 알지

translation.en: Wins what, Richard?
I don't know. Nothing.
translation.ko: - 이기면 뭐가 좋은데? - 몰라 아무것도 없어 그냥 이기는 거지

translation.en: Just wins.
It seems silly to me. I don't understand why we have to do it.
translation.ko: 너무 유치해 왜 해야 하는지 모르겠어

translation.en: Because Mother would want us to.
I've got an idea. Whoever finds the most eggs this year wins a prize.
translation.ko: 좋은 생각이 있어 올해는 상을 걸고 하자

translation.en: But what kind of prize?
If you win, I've gotta give you something.
translation.ko: 네가 이기면 내가 너한테 상을 줄게

translation.en: And if I win, you've gotta give me something.
translation.ko: 내가 이기면 네가 나한테 주는 거야

translation.en: It's a wonderful idea.
I hid ten eggs somewhere between the beach and the berry patch.
translation.ko: 해변이랑 산딸기밭 사이에 달걀 열 개를 숨겨 놨어

translation.en: I hid ten eggs between the rocks and the fern glade.
translation.ko: 난 바위랑 고사리 공터 사이에 숨겨 놨어

translation.en: -Ready? -Ready. Get set. Go!
I found nine. Beat that.
translation.ko: 난 아홉 개나 찾았다 오빠는 못 이길걸

translation.en: -I only found eight. -The winner's me! Where's my prize?
translation.ko: - 난 여덟 개밖에 없어 - 내가 이겼다! 상 내놔

translation.en: Richard, you were down there so long. What were you doing?
translation.ko: 왜 이렇게 오래 걸렸어? 뭐 한 거야?

translation.en: You'll see.
Your prize.
I'm going to keep this forever.
My prize. The white bead.
I think it looks nice in my hair.
Do you?
I don't care what you do with it.
translation.ko: 그걸로 뭘 하든 난 관심 없어

translation.en: Or how you wear it.
You can hang it from your nose for all I care.
Back and forth.
Round and round. You think this whole reef is yours.
translation.ko: 빙글빙글 돌고 이 바다가 네 건 줄 알아?

translation.en: You think you can swallow anything that swims.
translation.ko: 헤엄치는 건 다 삼킬 수 있을 것 같지?

translation.en: You'd like to catch me, wouldn't you?
But I was too fast for you, stupid sea slug. I can beat you every time.
translation.ko: 내가 훨씬 빨라, 이 굼벵이야 언제든 이길 수 있다고

translation.en: And if you don't believe me, I'll prove it.
Master of the reef!
The first time he almost got me, but I was too fast for him.
translation.ko: 처음에는 따라잡힐 뻔했는데 그래도 내가 훨씬 빨랐어

translation.en: This time he was lying in wait.
So I dive in, and I can see down his mouth.
There's about 500 teeth. There's stripy little fish around his gills.
translation.ko: 이빨이 5백 개쯤 있고 옆에 작은 물고기도 많았지

translation.en: And he comes at me...
He misses me. Stupid sea slug.
translation.ko: 내가 싹 피했어 멍청한 물고기 같으니라고

translation.en: -It seems silly to me. -Silly? It's not silly. It's dangerous.
Exactly. That's why it's silly. I don't understand why you have to do it.
translation.ko: 그러니까 유치하다는 거야 오빠가 왜 그러는지 모르겠어

translation.en: I like the way it makes me feel.
-What do you mean? -Inside here. It feels all alive when I know I'm master of the reef.
translation.ko: 바다의 왕이 되면, 내 안에서 뭔가가 살아 숨 쉬는 느낌이야

translation.en: The master of the reef. The master of the reef.
Don't you ever make fun of me.
I'm sorry.
Besides, you're the silly one. Always touching yourself and looking at yourself.
translation.ko: 너야말로 유치해 늘 거울 보면서 몸을 만지잖아

translation.en: I don't touch myself. Yes, you do.
You're always touching those when you look in the mirror.
I'm just measuring how much they've grown.
You shouldn't be looking at me when I'm naked.
translation.ko: 내가 발가벗고 있을 때 훔쳐보지 마

translation.en: Why not?
-I used to see you naked all the time. -Well, it's different now.
translation.ko: - 어릴 때부터 봤는데, 뭐 - 지금은 달라

translation.en: -Why? -I don't know.
I don't know why it's different, but it is.
Lilli?
I just wish things could be the way they used to be
when we had fun.
Remember the seesaw she made us?
The games we used to play?
Ring around the rosie?
Ring around the rosie
Pocket full of posies
Ashes, ashes We all fall down
Richard?
Yes?
You wouldn't mind if I moved my bed to another part of the house?
translation.ko: 내 침대 다른 방으로 옮겨도 돼?

translation.en: No.
If you weren't gonna do it, I was.
How long have you been there?
I saw the blood on the quilt.
Are you all right?
Do you remember
what Mother said would happen when I became a woman?
translation.ko: 여자가 되면 무슨 일이 생긴다고 했는지?

translation.en: Yes.
Well, I've become one.
Richard, wake up.
Richard?
Wake up.
I can't sleep with my bed facing the wrong way. Help me move it.
translation.ko: 침대 때문에 잠을 못 자겠어 구석으로 옮겨 줘

translation.en: -As soon as I'm awake. -You are awake.
No, I'm not. Stop it! Let go, I'm not dressed.
translation.ko: 아니야, 하지 마 나 옷 안 입었어

translation.en: Wrap the quilt around you.
Come on.
What's wrong? You're all humped over. Just give me a minute.
translation.ko: - 왜 그렇게 허리를 숙여? - 기다려 봐

translation.en: What happened to it? It gets that way all the time now.
translation.ko: - 이거 왜 이래? - 이제 맨날 이래

translation.en: -Does it hurt? -No.
Can you walk?
I can walk just fine. And I can make it go away if I want to, too.
translation.ko: 멀쩡히 걸어 다녀 다시 원래대로 돌릴 수도 있어

translation.en: -How? -None of your business.
If we start keeping secrets, nothing will be the same.
Nothing's the same around here anyway. Nothing's the way it used to be!
translation.ko: 옛날처럼 지낼 수 없어! 모든 게 달라졌다고!

translation.en: Come on, let's move your stupid bed.
Mother.
I don't know what to do.
He's changed, I've changed.
Everything's so confusing.
I'm tired of you always snooping on me. Go away. I'm sick of you always telling me to go away.
translation.ko: - 훔쳐보지 좀 마, 저리 가 - 나한테 가라고 하지 좀 마

translation.en: Go away, Richard. I mean it.
Fine. I'm going where I've always wanted to. To the north side of the island.
translation.ko: 좋아, 옛날부터 가고 싶었던 북쪽으로 갈 거야

translation.en: No, you can't do that. You know we're in a full moon.
-I can do whatever I want to do. -No, you can't. It's a rule.
translation.ko: - 내 마음이야 - 안 돼, 이건 규칙이야!

translation.en: It's not my rule, it was her rule. She wasn't even my real mother anyway.
translation.ko: 엄마 규칙이잖아 어차피 내 엄마도 아닌데, 뭐

translation.en: She loved you like she was your real mother. I don't care.
I'm sick of her rules, and I'm sick of your rules. From now on, I can do whatever I want to do.
translation.ko: 규칙은 지긋지긋해 이제부터 내 마음대로 할 거야

translation.en: I'm old enough.
translation.ko: 나도 다 컸으니까 가고 싶으면 갈 수 있어

translation.en: I can go wherever I want to go, and come home when I want to.
translation.ko: 나도 다 컸으니까 가고 싶으면 갈 수 있어 집에 오고 싶을 때 올 거야

translation.en: Richard?
What happened? What have you done?
I had to hide.
There were all these heathens, and they danced around me.
translation.ko: 야만인들이 춤을 추고 있었어 날 보지는 못했어

translation.en: They didn't see me. If they had, I'd have been dead.
translation.ko: 야만인들이 춤을 추고 있었어 날 보지는 못했어 봤다면 날 죽였을 거야

translation.en: And there was this one heathen, and at first I wanted to kill him.
translation.ko: 야만인 한 명이랑 마주쳤어 처음에는 그 사람을 죽이고 싶었는데

translation.en: And then I didn't want to kill him. And then I couldn't kill him.
Then he saw you. He'll tell the others.
translation.ko: - 그럼 오빠를 본 거네 - 소문 안 낼 거야

translation.en: No. I let him go. Peace.
translation.ko: - 그럼 오빠를 본 거네 - 소문 안 낼 거야 내가 보내 줬거든 평화를 지킬 거야

translation.en: I hope you're right. Richard, I'm so glad you're not hurt.
I thought I'd never see you again. I never want us to fight again. Ever.
translation.ko: 다시는 못 보는 줄 알았어 우리 이제 싸우지 말자

translation.en: Me either.
-Lilli? -Yes?
-Friends? -Oh, yes. Always.
I feel like crying.
So do I.
-I want us to be husband and wife. -Yes.
With this ring, I thee wed.
With this ring, I thee wed, Richard.
Amen.
-And now we're-- -One...
Forever.
Look.
Lilli, hurry. The signal fire!
Richard, what if they're heathens? I'm frightened.
Maybe we shouldn't light the signal fire. Let's see who they are first.
translation.ko: 그럼 불 피우지 말고 일단 지켜보자

translation.en: There's eight people.
The one in the light covering may be a woman.
translation.ko: 밝은색 옷을 입은 건 여자 같아

translation.en: Woman?
Keep them in your sight. They may not be civilized.
translation.ko: 잘 보고 있게 문명에 뒤떨어졌을 거야

translation.en: Civilized. C-i-v-i-l-i-z-e-d.
Remember what Mother said about a good, firm handshake.
translation.ko: 엄마가 손을 세게 잡고 악수하라고 하셨어

translation.en: My name is Richard.
We've been waiting for you for a long time.
I'm Lilli, and I'm ready for you to take us back to civilization.
translation.ko: 전 릴리예요, 저희를 다시 문명사회로 데려가 주세요

translation.en: What?
I am Capt. Jacob Hilliard, master of the Trade Wind.
And we... Is this your land?
Yes. My house is there.
Well, we're in need of fresh water. Our casks are fouled.
translation.ko: 우리는 맑은 물이 필요합니다 물통이 상했어요

translation.en: Will you grant us permission to come ashore?
Yes. You are welcome here.
If you don't mind covering yourself, I'll get my daughter.
translation.ko: 그쪽이 옷을 좀 걸치면 제 딸을 데려오겠습니다

translation.en: Does that binding around your neck choke you? No, certainly not.
translation.ko: - 그거 매면 안 답답하세요? - 아니요, 전혀요

translation.en: Well, yes, sometimes.
I'd appreciate it if you'd...
How do you catch fish with that spear?
It's not a spear, mate.
-What is it? -It's a rifle.
Blow a man's head right off his shoulders.
Castaways. How exciting.
They seem to be an odd mixture of knowledge and ignorance.
translation.ko: 지식이 있는 듯하면서도 좀 모자란 느낌이야

translation.en: Their attire is a little bit...
Well, it's quite sparse.
Is anything wrong?
The color, it's the same as the sky.
Pure silk.
With my compliments.
And one for your brother.
Oh, he's not my brother. He's my husband.
Your husband?
Mother died six years ago.
-How do you follow the years? -She taught us.
translation.ko: - 햇수는 어떻게 세나요? - 엄마가 가르쳐 주셨어요

translation.en: We count the moons. We know that twelve full moons are one year.
We have Christmas and Thanksgiving and Easter.
Although we're not exactly sure we celebrate them on the right days.
It's utterly amazing, the two of you all these years...
In this remote godforsaken place.
translation.ko: 이렇게 신에게 버려진 외딴섬에 갇혀 지냈다니요

translation.en: Not godforsaken, Capt. Hilliard.
Not godforsaken at all.
You do set an excellent table. My compliments to the chef.
Look, Sylvia. They've fashioned their own dinnerware.
translation.ko: 실비아, 이것 봐라 직접 식기를 만들었구나

translation.en: Cups, soup spoons. Ingenious.
Won't Mr. Quinlan be joining us?
translation.ko: - 퀸런 씨는 왜 안 오시죠? - 퀸런은 선원이라

translation.en: Mr. Quinlan is a seafarer and prefers to be by himself.
translation.ko: - 퀸런 씨는 왜 안 오시죠? - 퀸런은 선원이라 혼자 먹는 걸 좋아합니다

translation.en: It's plain to see why you've been lost for so long.
translation.ko: 이렇게 오랫동안 당신들을 못 찾은 이유를 알겠어요

translation.en: The charts don't even show this island. It's a wonder we found you.
translation.ko: - 해도에는 이 섬이 없습니다 - 저희가 온 건 기적이에요

translation.en: Heathens come to the north side of the island, at certain times.
There's a burial ground there.
This is ever so tasty. A great treat from the slop we have to eat on the ship.
translation.ko: 정말 맛있네요, 배에서 먹던 음식이랑 차원이 달라요

translation.en: What is it?
Eel broth.
Eel?
Well, only the broth is eel.
The little white chunks are sea urchin.
We appreciate your hospitality and hope
that you'll offer us the opportunity to repay you.
You can.
You can take us with you, back to civilization.
I should think... It must be awfully boring here.
What is the meaning of "boring"?
Well, boring is when you have nothing whatever to do.
translation.ko: 지루한 건 아무것도 할 게 없는 거예요

translation.en: So you're bored. Like you must be here.
translation.ko: 그러면 '지루하다'고 해요 두 사람이 느끼는 것처럼요

translation.en: No. We're never bored.
Boots, and a shirt, and cotton trousers.
I'll let Sylvia explain the female garments.
translation.ko: 여자 옷은 실비아가 설명해 줄 거예요

translation.en: Well, carry on.
Buttons.
I remember buttons on Mother's dress.
It's Irish lace.
Richard, you'll have to turn your head. I'm going to show Lillian a foundation garment.
translation.ko: 리처드, 고개 돌려요 릴리한테 속옷 보여 줄 거예요

translation.en: Although, I dare say, there isn't much you haven't seen.
-What does it do? -It goes around the waist, like this.
And then cinch the drawstring.
Don't look yet, Richard. I'm showing Lillian my secrets.
translation.ko: 아직 보지 마요, 리처드 비밀 상자도 보여 줘야 하니까

translation.en: Look. This is velvet plush.
translation.ko: 이것 봐요 이건 벨벳 플러시 천이에요 이건 은이고요

translation.en: And these are silver.
translation.ko: 이건 벨벳 플러시 천이에요 이건 은이고요

translation.en: It's so smooth.
Hairbrush and comb. Powder puff.
And rouge, and powder.
Lavender water.
Musk-rose perfume.
And a hand mirror.
You're very pretty.
Except for the hue of your skin, but we can fix that.
translation.ko: 릴리는 피부색만 빼면 정말 예뻐요 물론 바꿀 수 있어요

translation.en: What's wrong with my skin?
The sun has tainted it all brown. We'll have to lighten it with lemon juice.
translation.ko: 햇볕에 그을었잖아요 레몬즙으로 환하게 해 줄게요

translation.en: Why?
Well, you don't want people in San Francisco to think you're a field hand, do you?
translation.ko: 안 그러면 사람들은 릴리가 농장 노동자인 줄 알 거예요

translation.en: No.
That's worse than fish fat. It's quite costly.
Well, look at you.
You do look handsome in your boulevard suit.
So handsome.
Do you think I've applied too much rouge, Richard?
No. I think it's beautiful.
Well, thank you, kind sir.
Now I'm all powder and paint with nothing to do, as usual.
translation.ko: 화장은 다 했는데 할 일이 없네요

translation.en: We could go outside and count stars. Is that what you do here at night? Count stars?
translation.ko: - 나가서 별을 셀까요? - 밤에 그런 걸 해요?

translation.en: Sometimes we count stars.
Sometimes I play my whistle, and we sing.
Sometimes we mate. Sometimes we sleep.
Mate?
-Yes. -Do you mate often?
Whenever we want to.
Just like that? Yes.
Sometimes we dance. I love to dance.
translation.ko: 가끔 춤도 춰요 전 춤추는 걸 좋아해요

translation.en: Come on, Richard. Let's show Sylvia how we dance.
Ring around the rosie
Pocket full of posies
Ashes ashes
We all fall down
Come on, Sylvia. You try it.
I don't call that a dance. It's childish and simple-minded.
What do you mean? Grown people don't dance like that.
translation.ko: - 무슨 말이에요? - 어른은 그런 춤 안 춰요

translation.en: Maybe we should learn a grown-up dance for San Francisco?
-I shall teach you. -Will you?
It's like this.
It's a bit naughty. It's called the Spanish polka.
Spirit`s willing, flesh is weak Kiss me, darling, on the cheek
translation.ko: 정신은 강하고 육체는 약하지 내 볼에 입 맞춰요, 내 사랑

translation.en: Now do it slow.
One, two, three. One, two, three. One, two, three.
You're a beautiful dancer, Richard. One, two, three.
Lillian's going to have to brush up on her manners.
It's not polite to leave your guest in the middle of a lesson.
translation.ko: 수업 중에 저렇게 나가는 건 무례한 행동이에요

translation.en: Sorry, but she'll just have to wait her turn.
One, two, three. One, two, three.
She's gonna teach me how to mazurka.
As soon as I get it right, I'll show you.
You lied to me.
When did I lie to you?
You told me once that you'd never hurt me.
How did I hurt you?
When you always stare at her, it hurts me.
I'm sorry.
It's just that she's so different.
In what way?
Just look at her. The way she's all covered up.
But you said you found all those clothes stupid and unnecessary.
translation.ko: 옷 입는 건 멍청하고 쓸데없는 짓이라며

translation.en: I do.
It's just... I wonder what she looks like underneath all of them.
translation.ko: 그런데 그냥... 옷 안이 어떤 모습일지 궁금해

translation.en: You mean, you want to look at her, because you can't see her?
translation.ko: 그러니까 실비아를 보는 이유가 옷 속이 안 보이기 때문이야?

translation.en: Yes.
You remember when I wanted to go to the north side of the island just because I couldn't?
translation.ko: 북쪽에 가지 말라고 했을 때 내가 더 가고 싶어 했잖아

translation.en: Yes, I do.
And I also remember what almost happened to you when you did go.
Good night, Richard.
-What have you done to yourself? -Don't you like it?
translation.ko: - 뭐 한 거야? - 마음에 안 들어?

translation.en: No. Wash it off.
You don't like it on me, but you love it on Sylvia.
translation.ko: 내가 하면 안 예쁘고 실비아가 하면 예쁘구나

translation.en: Please, Lilli, let's not fight.
translation.ko: 릴리, 싸우지 말자 안 싸우기로 약속했잖아

translation.en: -We promised we'd never fight. -No.
translation.ko: 릴리, 싸우지 말자 안 싸우기로 약속했잖아 됐어

translation.en: You never eat breakfast anymore. Are you sick?
translation.ko: 요즘 아침도 안 먹잖아 어디 아파?

translation.en: Richard, I'm ready for my lesson now.
I promised to teach her how to fish.
Here we are together.
Out here in the middle of a beautiful fishpond.
In plain view of everyone.
So respectable.
But look at this, kind sir.
All we have to do is lower our heads...
And we're completely hidden from prying eyes.
translation.ko: 그러면 엿보는 눈을 피해 숨을 수 있어요

translation.en: So we can do whatever we want.
Lovely. Get out of here!
Come on, don't be like that.
-Richard! -Richard!
He'll never hear you. He'll be out playing games with Miss Sylvia for hours.
translation.ko: 절대 못 들을걸 실비아 아가씨랑 바다에서 놀고 있거든

translation.en: Richard! Richard! Richard! Richard!
But you're missing something. -Where's your lovely pearl? -I don't know what you mean.
translation.ko: - 진주가 없네, 어디 있어? - 무슨 말이에요?

translation.en: The white bead that you wear in your hair. Where is it? At the house.
translation.ko: - 머리에 꽂았던 구슬 말이야 - 집에 있어요

translation.en: Lilli.
It's no time to be thinking about Lilli.
I told her I'd never hurt her.
Don't feel sorry for her, Richard. She's had you all to herself.
translation.ko: 죄책감 가질 거 없어요 지금까지 곁에 있었잖아요

translation.en: But she doesn't own you. You're not married. We are.
But not really.
A lot of made up words in the middle of a jungle doesn't count.
translation.ko: 정글에서 맺은 가짜 서약은 진짜 결혼이 아니에요

translation.en: It does to me.
Why don't you just follow your heart.
She is my heart.
Where is it?
You can't just leave me here.
Very rude behavior. You'll never fit in civilized society.
Get away from her.
-That came from the house. -Get the other rifle, quickly.
Give me that rifle, quick.
No.
Get him.
Look out!
Help us!
Quinlan, you'll kill him. All right, Quinlan, that's enough.
You heard me, I said enough.
Break it up.
Quinlan!
Keep out of it, Giddens. I'll take his bloody head off.
-Get off him. -Take orders. Put that down.
Bugger off. You heard the Captain. Drop that, or you'll answer to mutiny.
translation.ko: - 꺼져! - 총 안 버리면 가만 안 둬

translation.en: -Quinlan, put it down. -Look out, Richard!
Run!
Are you all right?
I'm fine.
I always weather a storm well.
translation.ko: 난 원래 어려운 상황을 잘 헤쳐 나가

translation.en: -I get that from Mother. -Yes, you do.
Capt. Hilliard says he wants to set sail at dawn.
I guess that means Capt. Hilliard's daughter wants to set sail at dawn.
I don't care what she wants.
translation.ko: 난 실비아에게 전혀 관심 없어 정말이야

translation.en: I don't care about her at all. I know that now, Lilli.
translation.ko: 난 실비아에게 전혀 관심 없어 정말이야 이제 알겠어, 릴리

translation.en: Don't you understand, you're the most important thing to me.
translation.ko: 나한테 가장 소중한 건 바로 너야

translation.en: You can set sail at dawn.
But we're not going.
You're not making sense.
Do you remember...
That lullaby she used to sing to us?
Love Divine
all Loves excelling
Yes.
Will you teach me to play it on this?
Why?
I'm going to have use for it.
There's a baby growing inside of me.
How do you know?
A woman knows these kind of things, that's how.
Lilli!
And I won't let it be born in civilization.
translation.ko: 우리 아기를 문명사회에서 낳고 싶지 않아

translation.en: I want it to be born right here.
Where there's no evil, and no lies, and no guns.
translation.ko: 나쁜 사람도, 거짓말도 없고 총도 없는 곳에서 말이야

translation.en: You're right.
We'll stay here.
Just the three of us.
I love you, Lilli.
